Posts.EditableText:
If you add your own "use" verb then anything you've set up under "Edit 'Use' Details" for an object won't work, so I recommend you never add "use" as a verb to an object.

You can edit the ASL if you open up your game file in Notepad.

As I said earlier, if you attach your game file here, or email it to me, I'll be able to help you better because I'll be able to see exactly how you've got things set up, and if you've got anything that might be causing conflicts (like a broken synonym).
